OK readers digest version

12580

Phobia supressed a smile as KitKatput his theories into her own 
words, "My dear sweet Wolf it would seem we have a problem." Phobia 
tells her, "Megatron has many associates in this war, it's up to you 
to discredit him and gain thier approval." He didn't know for sure 
but if Megatron was the same slimebot he was on cybertron then it was 
a safe bet he had the same influence here.

12581

"From what you've told me about them the Vok seem to be a secondary 
threat to this planet. But they could easily move into the number one 
spot since they teamed up with Megatron." He smiled and turned back 
to KitKat "But with your leadership qualities I'm sure we'll all be 
safe."
12584

"Again Phobia smiled, "I have a small colection of weapons from all 
my victims, and the heavy weapons from the warship I was formerly 
stationed on." he stepped forward closer to KitKat as if trying not 
to be overheard. "You remember the weapon I was carrying when I first 
arrived? Well it just happens I have an entire crate filled with 
them." he steps back a little. "In the battle my rifle was only set 
on 25% power. If Megatron knew that then I'd be in trouble. Always 
remember, don't use full power until you know who to trust with that 
power."

12651
Kit Kat left the ship in a hurry, Phobia walked to his 
console, "Replay last incoming message to KitKat" the ship replayed 
the distress signal KitKat had recieved. "Good, saving those twowill 
increase her popularity." his plan was falling together nicely.
